DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate ZipLine Medical Surgical Skin Closure device ( Zip ) versus suture utilized skin layer closure wound closure Cesarean Section Procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Zip Incision Approximation vs. Suture C-Section
DOC.detailed_description: Cesarean-section birth invasive surgical procedure . While desired outcome focus primarily successful delivery healthy baby maintenance mother 's health , surgery involve complex surgical closure process , start uterus , progress several layer traditionally suture closure several tissue plane . A successful closure result surgical site complication , good patient comfort minimal scar desire outcome . Conventional skin closure method suture effective drawback . It suggest ideal method wound / incision closure : - fast - non-traumatic - minimally non-invasive - associate low incidence adverse event dehiscence infection - yielding acceptable cosmetic result ZipLine Medical , Inc. Campbell , California-based company develop novel , non-invasive skin closure device call Zip Surgical Skin Closure replace suture , staple glue closure skin layer surgical incision laceration repair . In USA , device classify FDA Class I , 510 ( k ) Exempt device begin commercial use USA April 2013 . The ZipLine Device clinically demonstrate benefit include ( reference include later document ) : - Closure speed faster/superior ( less variable compare ) suture - Suture-like cosmetic outcome - Reduction post-surgical care cost - Fewer closure-related wound issue - Greater patient satisfaction
